text: The Blue Veil is a 1951 American drama movie directed by Curtis Bernhardt and is the remake of the 1942 French movie of the same name. It stars Jane Wyman, Charles Laughton, Joan Blondell, Richard Carlson, Agnes Moorehead, Cyril Cusack, Natalie Wood, Audrey Totter, Don Taylor, Alan Napier and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1952. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 drama movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies directed by Curtis Bernhardt
title: The Blue Veil (1951 movie)
